tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Sightings
programme.desc: In south Texas, residents have reported strange phenomena, stories of supernatural events have abounded, and a 10-year-old girl has disappeared.

programme.title: JAG: Scimitar
programme.desc: Two Marines in a Humvee mistakenly drive into Iraq; an Iraqi detail intercepts them, kills one, and captures the other.

programme.title: JAG: Defensive Action
programme.desc: A patrolling F-14 malfunctions in a no-fly zone; the crew ejects, and the bird explodes.

programme.title: JAG: Boot.
programme.desc: A woman Marine recruit dies at Parris Island. Harm investigates while Meg poses undercover as a recruit.

programme.title: JAG: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: During a landing exercise Marines find a beaten, comatose fellow Marine on the beach.

programme.title: JAG: Hemlock
programme.desc: By mistake a foreign agent sends a fax to Meg's office; then he retrieves it and shoots Meg to prevent her from identifying him.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Adaptation
programme.desc: While Team Scorpion works to stop an influx of drugs being smuggled into the country via drones, Walter gives Happy and Toby an ultimatum on their new relationship.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Fast & The Nerdiest
programme.desc: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ticker
programme.desc: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit.

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.

programme.title: Scorpion: Twist And Shout
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's mission to recover the remains of fallen Marines in Vietnam is threatened along with their lives when a deadly tornado heads directly towards them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Hard Knox
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A seasonʼs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 2
programme.desc: Whatever was making itself known to the team earlier, continues in this episode as\nsomething seems to be following Yvette from the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 2
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Tamworth and a beautiful manor house that is said to be filled with\nparanormal occurrences. Almost as soon as the team get there something seems to want to\nmake itself known with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Ancient High House
programme.desc: The team are followed around this ancient house said to be the haunt of many long dead spirits. The team are soon put to the test as Gregg feels something is playing with him.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted tackle the deserted sprawling Ashwell Prison in this As-Live uncut episode. Feeling isolated and separated the team find themselves confronted by something in the dark.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to film at Ashwell Prison after being pushed to the limits tempers fray and Yvette is stuck alone, petrified as she is stalked by an unseen force lost in the corridors of the prison and the team scramble to save her.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Heir Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hampton Falls, New Hampshire to investigate the Governors Mansion, a property Steve has investigated before with a local team.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead & Breakfast
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates a 19thcentury Bed and Breakfast in Red Boiling Springs, Tennessee, built by the Cloyd family.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Princess and the EVP
programme.desc: The final day has arrived –it's Grant's last investigation with TAPS. And where better to close out his phenomenal run but at Jason and Grant's very own haunted property, Spalding Inn, located in Whitefield, New Hampshire.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hoover Damned
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Boulder City, Nevada to investigate Boulder City Hospital.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Distillery of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Buffalo Trace Distillery in Frankfort, Kentucky to investigate hauntings at the oldest operating distillery in America.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 2
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.238
programme.desc: A woman sues her older daughter over a case involving her emancipated teenager. Ex-lovers dispute car payments, insurance, and property return.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.85
programme.desc: Two men sue former friends for having them falsely arrested for assault and for making terrorist threats/A woman claims she threw a lawn chair at two men in self-defense; she and her husband sue them for alleged threats and moneyowed.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.38
programme.desc: Man's jaw broken at party, misses Thanksgiving dinner, sues assailant/Woman sues ex for TV value, unpaid phone bill; he claims TV sold to unreachable friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.123
programme.desc: Navy woman unaware of boyfriend's girlfriend loans $3,000 for car rims; man admits drunken stupor caused furniture damage.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171
programme.desc: Teen sustains broken eye socket in black sweatshirt altercation; accused claims self-defense. Man aids son with financial aid post-back injury, demands repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.182
programme.desc: A brutal catfight ensues after a teenager gossips about infidelities between her brother and her best girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.35
programme.desc: Man spends life savings to bring children to US, they sue each other over car insurance and repossession/Single mothers move in together, dispute unpaid rent, utility bills, and alleged house damage.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.51
programme.desc: Young nurse sues ex-boyfriend for damages, Dodge Durango payments, motorcycle damages, and unpaid cell phone charges/Woman sues evicted friend and child for back rent, countersued for belongings left behind.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: There is chaos during service on steak night, prompting Chef Ramsay to throw one team off the job due to infighting.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The arrival of three special guests, including David Beckham, raises the pressure during service. In the team challenge the chefs must roll dice with letters on them, choosing ingredients starting with the letters they roll.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams submit to the annual blind taste test challenge. The winners spend a day at a water park while the losers make deliveries, grind peppercorn, change the oil in the fryers and peel potatoes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs create their own menus in the toughest challenge yet, chef Ramsay relies on diner comment cards for his brutally honest criticism.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Spurred on by a gospel choir serenade, the contestants must find inspiration from the American Deep South for a Southern-style menu.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have to prepare three dishes of Chef Ramsay's choosing, taking it in turns to complete the dish. One team feels the heat during service and needs help from their rivals to get the food out.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: When aliens have infiltrated society by inhabiting bodies of select human beings, they plan a full-scale invasion of Earth. A detective finds the information that can stop the attack; however the information is in the mind of a six-year-old child.

programme.title: The Four Warriors
programme.desc: Travelling home, four soldiers discover a village gripped by fear, as residents are abducted by unknown predators. These warriors set out to rescue them and destroy what lurks outside the village.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Relative Values
programme.desc: When a star and Hollywood Diva Miranda Frayle brek up, a playboy prince with a stiff upper lip sweeps her off her feet and boldly takes her home to meet his high class society minded mother.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.

programme.title: Crystal Skulls
programme.desc: It is 2020 and the apocalypse is inevitable. 12 of 13 Crystal skulls are united causing catastrophic events. Only the 13th Skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed from within by their power.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Wrong Girl
programme.desc: Sophia is an ideal 17 year old student, who quickly strikes up a friendship with Grace, the new girl in school. But their friendship takes a sinister turn when Grace begins disrupting the lives of Sophia and her family.

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: A dying father takes a road trip with his son, to try to rebuild his relationship before he dies.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: You Belong To Me
programme.desc: After a radio talk show host takes to the airwaves to discuss recent slayings of lonely women aboard cruise ships, she receives information that leads her to believe she knows the killer and may be the next target.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When an outlaw leader lures Marshall Torrance out of town, Only Lucas can stop him from lynching a local man who killed one of the members of his gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former army captain comes to North Fork to kill the man who shot down his son in a gunfight - Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his friend become trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark try to persuade a persecuted young mute to return stolen money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A doctor seeks revenge on the man he blames for ruining his practice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a young man, eerily similar to a man he killed in the Civil War, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.(n)

programme.title: Can't Be Heaven
programme.desc: A young boy struggles to cope with adolescence without a father to guide him, but a friendly ghost helps him to face up to change and he receives an important lesson in love.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Experience the magical world of 'The Secret Garden' as never before in this beautiful production of the classic tale. When her parents are lost in a tragic accident, Mary must seek comfort in the strange and forgotten corridors of Misselthwaite Factory.

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.

programme.title: Groomzilla
programme.desc: A woman is surprised and dismayed when her fiance takes the planning of their wedding too seriously.

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: Two former British school friends take to the high seas to thwart a German invasion of Britain in 1901.

programme.title: The Upturned Glass
programme.desc: Suspenseful psychological thriller about a prosperous British brain surgeon who plots to murder the woman responsible for the death of the girl he loved.

programme.title: To the Public Danger
programme.desc: Four people meet in a pub and enjoy alcohol fuelled thrill seeking until things get out of hand and each person faces a moral choice with long-lasting consequences.

programme.title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
programme.desc: A quiet tenant at a London boarding house is suspected of being Jack the Ripper in Alfred Hitchcock's silent classic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Book of Love
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Milan, Italy to search for Casanova's lost Book of Love.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Myth of the Maze
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Claudia visit Athens, Greece to search the Minotaur's maze for the legendary golden twine.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Afterlife and Death
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Cairo, Egypt and then Amsterdam. They must beat rival relic hunter Avery Ko to the Pharaoh Thutmose's diamond before it is cut up and sold.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Etched in Stone
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Stewie Harper head to Stockholm, Sweden to find the Runestone of King Jann I of Norway.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Irish Crown Affair
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Dublin, Ireland in search of the missing crown of the last King of Ireland.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Biocrime (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis is hired to apprehend Father Abode, a former student of Dr. Novak, who has been producing genetic mutants for the sexual pleasure of wealthy clients. The chase reveals dark information about Marcus's past.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Mutant X encounters a new faction of New Mutants called the Strand, led by the powerful first mutant Gabriel Ashlocke.

programme.title: Mutant X: Past as Prologue
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to save his own life, Ashlocke revives an ancient Egyptian alchemist who poses a lethal threat to the Mutant X team.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team struggles to disempower a military colonel who has threatened to unleash a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke goes back in time to try and make himself invincible by giving something to his the younger self, prompting Brennan and Shalimar to follow him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Epiphany
programme.desc: The Taelons announce that they will all go into death stasis and wait on the mother ship for humans to discover how to create core energy and revive them. Zo'or and Da'an don't trust each other to be the last to submit to stasis.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Horizons
programme.desc: Eight Taelons are killed when protectors' implants are re-calibrated with a new imperative to kill instead of protect Taelons. They fear the Jiridians have found a way to control the CVIs. Meanwhile, their core energy continues to deplete.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Point of No Return
programme.desc: When Street solves the 8th dimension of Ma'el's riddle, a beacon leads Liam to a chamber with a healing pool. However, there is only enough in the healing pool to help 6 Taelons. Zo'or will do anything to insure his own life.(n)
